entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
